ONE-STOP-SHOP: Discover the Future of Date Sorting
Description-hjz: At Nighat, we're reshaping the date sorting industry by integrating cutting-edge AI and machine learning technologies. Our systems ensure precision grading and efficient automated sorting to deliver the highest-quality dates, quick delivery, and reduced manpower costs.
Subscribe: I want to try it now
Feature-Description-01: Our cutting-edge technology accurately grades dates based on unique skin characteristics, guaranteeing top-tier quality with every batch
Feature-Description-02: Say goodbye to manual sorting. Our system seamlessly integrates with a sophisticated mechanical mechanism, streamlining the sourcing process and reducing cost and human error
Feature-Description-03: We understand the financial challenges faced by farmers and date factories. That's why we offer a pay-as-you-go model, allowing payments to be made post-harvest, aligning with market sales and reducing upfront costs
How-work-Title-01: Supply the raw dates & Turn on
How-work-Description-01: The dates will be placed on the production line conveyor and the machine will be operated
How-work-Description-02: The machine will take a picture of each date on the conveyor, identify its type, and then sort it into the appropriate box based on the type
How-work-Description-03: Monitor all sorting steps and results from a single screen
FAQ-Title-01: What sets Nighat apart in the date-sorting technology industry?
FAQ-Description-01: At Nighat, we're more than just another tech company; we're industry pioneers, continuously pushing the limits of date sourcing technology and operational efficiency. Our solutions are crafted with affordability in mind, ensuring that cutting-edge technology is accessible to all without sacrificing quality. By equipping farmers and date processing facilities with our innovative technology, we do more than just change their operationsâ€”we are transforming the entire industry.
FAQ-Title-02: Does it require purchasing the device for date sorting?
FAQ-Description-02: No, you do not need to purchase the entire product. Instead, the Nighat team will visit your factory or farm to understand your requirements and then bring the date sorting machine for your specific needs. The sorting will be charged either per carton or by weight.
FAQ-Title-03: Is hjz help me to know more about my business?
FAQ-Description-03: Of course, you can check your rush hours, your loyal customers and use the data for advertising.
